Room.Name: Boran's Hut
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the hut of Boran, the mountain giant who guards Boran Trail.
Room.LongDescription: The giants who live in Phexton Village have appointed Boran, one of the larger giants, to guard the narrow trail which leads to the Valley of the Rainflowers. They make a lot of money by harvesting the Rainflower seeds, and don't want travelers going there.
